subject: Revised document
body: Hi Ravindu, can you send the revised document by Friday?

subject: Client meeting follow-up
body: Please follow up with the client and update me by tomorrow.

subject: FYI - Deployment done
body: Deployment is completed. No action required.

subject: URGENT: Project deadline moved up
body: The project deadline has been moved to today. Please complete the final report immediately and send it to the client.

subject: Team meeting notes
body: Here are the notes from today's meeting. No immediate action required, but please review for any follow-ups next week.

subject: Policy update
body: We have updated the company policy on remote work. Please read the attached document and acknowledge by end of month.

subject: Feedback on proposal
body: Thank you for the proposal. We need some revisions: update the pricing section and add a timeline. Please send the updated version by Wednesday.

subject: Weekly digest
body: This week's digest includes industry news and tips. No action needed.

subject: Order confirmation
body: Your order has been confirmed. Expected delivery is in 2 weeks. If you have any questions, reply to this email.

subject: Please review the slide deck
body: Can you review the attached slide deck and send feedback by end of day?

subject: Need updated timeline
body: Please update the timeline and resend the proposal by Monday.

subject: Password reset required
body: Please reset your password within 48 hours to comply with security policy.

subject: RSVP: Town hall
body: Please RSVP for the town hall next Wednesday. No other action required.

subject: Quote request
body: Can you provide a quote for 100 units by Friday?

subject: Read ASAP: Board update
body: Board requested the Q1 update — compile the summary and send within 2 hours.

subject: Schedule integration meeting
body: Let's schedule a call to discuss integration next week. Please propose 3 time slots.

subject: Interview feedback
body: Please submit your feedback on the candidate by tomorrow morning.

subject: Invoice discrepancy
body: We noticed a discrepancy in invoice #1234. Could you confirm and correct by Friday?

subject: Approve the campaign copy
body: Please review and approve the campaign copy by EOD so we can launch.

subject: Service outage report
body: We experienced an outage; please create an incident report by Monday.

subject: Change request
body: Client requests a scope change: add two new features. Need impact estimate by Thursday.

subject: Delivery delay
body: Delivery delayed by 3 days. No immediate action required unless you want expedited shipping.

subject: Schedule confirmation
body: Your meeting is confirmed for next Tuesday at 10 AM.

subject: Quick favor
body: Can you draft a one-page summary of the project status by this afternoon?

subject: Contract review needed
body: Please review the attached contract and flag any issues by Monday.

subject: Ticket #987 resolved
body: Your ticket has been resolved. No action required.

subject: Sync on feature X
body: Can you sync with me on feature X? No deliverables, just a short call.

subject: Approval for go-live
body: Please confirm approval to go live by Thursday.

subject: Training reminder
body: Reminder: Complete the compliance training by the end of the week.

subject: Maintenance window
body: Scheduled maintenance next Saturday. No action required unless you have objections.

subject: User research request
body: Please recruit 5 users for a study and send candidate list by Friday.

subject: Billing question
body: Can you confirm the billing address for our account?

subject: Data discrepancy
body: We found a data discrepancy; please investigate and provide root cause by Monday.

subject: Career chat
body: Would you have 30 minutes this week for a quick career chat?

subject: Press release review
body: Please review the draft press release and provide edits by Friday.

subject: Phishing alert
body: We detected a phishing attempt. Please change credentials if you clicked any link.

subject: Finalize SOW
body: Please finalize the statement of work and return by next Wednesday.

subject: Contract renewal
body: Contract renewal notice: review and approve the renewal by end of month.

subject: FYI - draft pushed
body: I pushed a draft to the repo. No action required unless you want to review.

subject: Urgent: data needed
body: We need the data export now to meet our deadline — please send immediately.

subject: Social post approval
body: Please approve the social post text by tomorrow morning.

subject: Expense approval
body: Approve or reject expense #4321 by end of week.

subject: Paper deadline
body: Draft paper due next Monday. Please contribute your section by Friday.

subject: Retention policy
body: We updated the retention policy — please review when convenient.

subject: Schedule change request
body: Can we move the meeting from Tuesday to Thursday?

subject: Invoice #555
body: Invoice attached. Please process payment within 30 days.

subject: Monthly trends
body: Monthly trends report attached. No action required.

subject: Reminder: password expires
body: Your password expires in 7 days. Please update it.
